name: Miguel's Birthday present Web Version
description:
My Project for the LudomJam,

All the Programming Part has been done by me, meanwhile the art is made by Lucia Paganini(she doesn’t possess a Ludom Dare Account), My partner in this GameJam.

Music is freeCopyright music from Youtube.

Movement: Directional Keys

Interaction/continue with the dialougue: Space

Please Play the Game in FullScreen and be patience, when you play without tutorial it will take time before Miguel will give you indications. During the Tutorial press Space to continue the Dialogue.
